title.narrative: Enhancing resilience to climate change and increasing income for pastoralist, agro-pastoralist and drop-out pastoralist communities in three drought-prone districts of Borana zone, Southern Ethiopia

description.narrative: This DFID-funded project will assist 115,715 pastoralists in Borana, Southern Ethiopia with Community Managed Disaster Risk Reduction systems, rehabilitated rangelands, water supply, increased and diversified income and livestock insurance.

participating-org.narrative: ACORD - Agency for Cooperation and Research in Development
CIFA - Community Initiative Facilitation and Assistance
SCIAF - Scottish Catholic International Aid Fund

sector.narrative: Includes community managed disaster risk reduction and index based livestock insurance
Includes income generation activities and asset building
Includes water structures and water filters
